title: The Heather-Moon
author: Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris)
snippet: The next bit of beauty was associated with theEttrick Shepherd (I can't bear to think of his name being Hogg), for hewrote a Covenanter story, "Brownie of Bodesbeck," about a mountain wecould see hovering in the distance.

title: The Heather-Moon
